mapper.select: select case when count(id)= 0 then 1 else max(id)+1 end from t_si_role
select site_id from t_si_role where id = #{id}
select count(1) from t_si_user u inner join t_si_userrole ur on u.id = ur.user_id inner join t_si_role r on ur.role_id = r.id where r.id = #{id}
select t.*,t2.name as site_name,t3.name as org_name from t_si_role t left outer join t_si_site t2 on t.site_id = t2.id left outer join t_si_organization t3 on t.org_id = t3.id where t.id = #{id};

select r.*,s.name as site_name,o.name as org_name from t_si_user u inner join t_si_userrole ur on u.id = ur.user_id inner join t_si_role r on ur.role_id = r.id left outer join t_si_site s on u.site_id = s.id left outer join t_si_organization o on u.org_id = o.id where u.id = #{userId};

select
t.*, t2.name as site_name, t3.name as org_name
from
t_si_role t left outer join t_si_site t2 on t.site_id = t2.id
where t.site_id != #{siteId}
